required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Real-Life Efficacy and Safety of Nivolumab in Patients With Advanced Renal Cell Carcinoma After Prior Therapy
clinical_study.official_title: A National, Prospective, Non-Interventional Study (NIS) of Nivolumab (BMS-936558) in Patients With Advanced Renal Cell Carcinoma After Prior Therapy

brief_summary.textblock: A Real-Life Study to Evaluate Efficacy and Safety of Nivolumab in Patients with Advanced Renal Cell Carcinoma after prior therapy.

secondary_outcome.measure: Distribution of socio-demographic characteristics in adult patients with advanced Renal Cell Carcinoma (RCC) initiating Nivolumab treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Socio-demographic characteristics (Gender, Height, Weight, Age) will be summarized using descriptive statistics

secondary_outcome.measure: Distribution of clinical characteristics in adult patients with advanced Renal Cell Carcinoma (RCC) initiating Nivolumab treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Clinical characteristics (Initial Diagnosis of RCC, Histological subtypes, Performance status, Comorbidities, history of cancer) will be summarized using descriptive statistics

secondary_outcome.measure: Distribution of incidence of Adverse Events (AEs)
Distribution of severity of Adverse Events (AEs)
Distribution of management of Adverse Events (AEs)
Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy - Kidney Symptom Index (FKSI-19) Questionnaire
European Quality of Life-5 Dimensions (EQ-5D) Questionnaire
Distribution of Renal Cell Carcinoma (RCC) Treatment History

secondary_outcome.description: Details on Prior and Evolution of Current Treatment Patterns

arm_group.arm_group_label: Advanced RCC patients initiating Nivo for the first time
arm_group.description: Adult patients with advanced Renal Cell Carcinoma(RCC) initiating Nivolumab treatment for the first time.

intervention.arm_group_label: Advanced RCC patients initiating Nivo for the first time

study_pop.textblock: Data of patients will be collected who are treated in office-based practices and outpatients dept. of clinics across Germany

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- â‰¥ 18 years
- diagnosis of advanced RCC (confirmed by histology or cytology)
- treatment decision to initiate a treatment with nivolumab for the first time for the treatment of RCC (according to the label approved in Germany) has already been taken
- signed informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- diagnosis of a cancer other than advanced RCC within the past 5 years, ie, a cancer other than RCC that requires systemic or other treatment. Patients that have been treated curatively more than 5 years ago with no evidence of recurrence and prostate cancer patients in active surveillance can be included
- previous treatment with nivolumab and/or ipilimumab
- current active participation in an interventional clinical trial for treatment of their advanced RCC.

overall_contact.last_name: Recruiting sites have contact information. Please contact the sites directly. If there is no contact information, please email:

overall_contact_backup.last_name: First line of the email MUST contain NCT# and Site #.
